title.rendered: 32 activists of BNP-Jamaat-Shibir arrested in Satkhira

content.rendered:
The police arrested 32 leaders and activists of Jamaat-Shibir and BNP, including District Chhatra Dal general secretary Mumtazul Islam Chandan and Municipal Jamaat Ameer Mustafizur Rahman on charges of planning sabotage in Satkhira.

They were sent to jail by the court on Tuesday (August 1) afternoon.Earlier, they were arrested on Monday night.

Among the detained leaders and activists are Abdul Hannan, President of Satkhira Municipal Ward No. 5 Jamaat, Amir Yasin Ali of Dhulihar Union Jamaat and Amir Osman Gani of Brahmarajpur Union Jamaat.  

Officer-in-Charge (OC) of Satkhira Sadar Police Station Mohidul Islam said that the Jamaat took out a huge Jhtika procession in Amtala area on Monday without the permission of the administration. Then they tried sabotage. After getting the information, raids were conducted in different parts of the district and they were arrested.
